record.description: Miss Betty Shimmin, University of Chicago senior from Kankakee, learns from TWA hostess Ardyce Dean how to prepare a tray for servicing a meal aboard a transport plane following her application for airline hostess work. Abandonment by TWA of a registered nurse's rating in favor of college girls because of wartime demands on nurses is enabling Miss Shimmin and other college seniors to start careers in interesting non-technical jobs in aviation.
